title: Under 1 year warranty ..phone changes date an time on me even after resetting..call 12523331992 judy
content: Device time changes and date go back to Nov Oct Dec 2020 when we are in March 2021 Spectrum says other people have had same issues.. when this happens I have no phone uses no in coming calls or texts (husband called cops one day to see if ok as my only access as no landline)  has been reset ..chip out and still having problems.  Help please before husband get a hold of the phone Judy M
